800.name: The Bottom of the Rainbow
800.description:
You are standing before a shimmering rainbow arching high up into the
sky.  You feel somehow separated from the natural world, even though the
city of Darkhaven lies below you.

exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light in colors that defy
description.

801.name: On the Rainbow
801.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicolored
light.  Through the bottom of the rainbow you can barely make out the
cathedral of Darkhaven.

exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light in colors that defy
description.

802.name: On the Rainbow
802.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicolored
light.  Through the bottom of the rainbow you can see the city of Darkhaven and
the land surrounding it.  The vast landscape seems to be leagues below you.

exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow softly glows with beams of light in colors that defy
description.

803.name: On the Rainbow
803.description:
You are standing on the rainbow, surrounded by many beams of multicolored
light.  The rainbow extends above and below you as far as you can see.

exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow brightly glows with beams of light in colors that defy
description.

804.name: On the Rainbow
804.description:
You are nearing the end of the rainbow.  The beams of multicolored
light have begun to merge and solidify.  All around you you see glowing
star-like motes of dust.  High above you is a floating bridge.

exdescs.bridge:
The colors of the rainbow seem to converge into a glowing bridge that leads
to a massive white gate.
exdescs.dust:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.motes:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow brilliantly glows with beams of blinding light, in colors
that sweep together and merge before your eyes.
exdescs.star:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.stars:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

805.name: The Glowing Bridge at the Rainbow's End
805.description:
After a long climb you have reached the end of the rainbow.  The brilliant
colors have twisted and merged into a beautiful glowing bridge that leads
toward a massive white gate to the north.  All around you is a soft, peaceful
glow interrupted only by the passing of star-like dust motes before your eyes.

exdescs.bridge: The bridge glows with an unearthly light.
exdescs.dust:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.gate:
The gate towers ten feet above your head. Beyond it is a field of utter
blackness from which the motes of light seem to issue forth.
exdescs.motes:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.rainbow:
The rainbow seems to be forming directly from the light of the bridge.  It
drops out of sight below you.
exdescs.star:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.
exdescs.stars:
The star-like motes dance before your eyes.  They are incredibly beautiful yet
intangible -- your hand passes right through them.

806.name: The Astral Gate
806.description:
The bridge ends here before a massive, pearly-colored gate beyond which
you can see a field of blackness filled with silvery snake-like tendrils,
stars, and occasional flashes of light.  A slate plaque inset in the wall
next to the gate catches your eye.

exdescs.gate:
You see a huge, glowing gate wrought from an incredibly hard translucent
material.  Each of the intricately carved bars of this mighty gate are about
as thick as a man's wrist, rising from the floor to a height of ten feet. A
plaque is inset into the wall next to the gate.
exdescs.plaque:
The plaque reads:

Let this gate stand to protect mortal man for all time against the perils of
the outer planes of existence and the creatures fair and foul that dwell
within.

(This zone, the Astral Plane and accompanying githyanki keep, was written by
 Andersen for any standard Merc 2.0 mud.)

(This zone was later renovated and spiced up by Lord Rennard for the
Realms of Despair.)

807.name: Into the Astral Plane
807.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting.  To the south is a set of pearly
gates: the sole mundane manner of leaving the Astral Plane.

exdescs.gate:
From here the pearly-colored gate seems very small and insubstantial.
Through its bars you can see the astral guardian, protecting Despair from the
perils of the Astral Plane.

808.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
808.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

809.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
809.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

810.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
810.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

811.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
811.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

812.name: Exploring the Astral Plane
812.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting, and it is difficult to maintain your
bearings and sense of direction.

813.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
813.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting.  The astral field lies in all
directions.

814.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
814.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is very disorienting.  The vast expanse of the astral
field lies in all directions.

815.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
815.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is disorienting, yet your instincts say you are
nearing what you seek.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

816.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
816.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is disorienting, yet your instincts say you are nearing
what you seek.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

817.name: Roaming the Astral Plane
817.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is disorienting, yet your instincts say you are nearing
what you seek.  All exits lead off into the astral plane.

818.name: Wandering the Astral Plane
818.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is highly disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

819.name: Wandering the Astral Plane
819.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is highly disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

820.name: Wandering the Astral Plane
820.description:

823.name: Travelling the Astral Plane
823.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

824.name: Travelling the Astral Plane
824.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

825.name: Travelling the Astral Plane
825.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

826.name: Travelling the Astral Plane
826.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

827.name: Travelling the Astral Plane
827.description:
You find yourself floating in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting.  Nearby you see a large silvery
strand of light.  All but one exit leads off into the astral field.

828.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
828.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

829.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
829.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

830.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
830.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

831.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
831.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

832.name: Traversing the Astral Plane
832.description:
You find yourself deep within in a dark field filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is extremely disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your sense of direction.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

833.name: Lost in the Astral Plane
833.description:
You find yourself in in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is incredibly disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your senses straight.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

834.name: Lost in the Astral Plane
834.description:
You find yourself in in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is incredibly disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your senses straight.  All exits lead off into the astral plane.

835.name: Lost in the Astral Plane
835.description:
You find yourself in in a field of blackness, filled with tiny tendrils
of silvery light and insubstantial shining motes of dust.  The weightlessness
of this environment is incredibly disorienting, and you are having trouble
keeping your senses straight.  All exits lead off into the astral field.

836.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
836.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

837.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
837.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

838.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
838.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

839.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
839.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

840.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
840.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

841.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
841.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

842.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
842.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

843.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
843.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

844.name: Walking the Silvery Strand
844.description:
You are standing atop a silvery strand of light that twists and turns
through the astral field.

845.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
845.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.  However, all but one of these
appears to be sealed by powerful magics.

846.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
846.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.  However, these appear to be
forever sealed by powerful magics.

847.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
847.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.  However, these appear to be
forever sealed by powerful magics.

848.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
848.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.  However these appear to be
sealed forever by powerful magics.

849.name: Deep Within the Astral Plane
849.description:
You have travelled deep inside the astral field.  Here the fabric of the
field has become twisted and warped due to the proximity of another plane of
existence.  Some of the tendrils of light that line the astral field have been
warped and twisted into portals to other worlds.  However, these appear to be
forever sealed by powerful magics.

850.name: Inside the Githyanki Keep
850.description:
You are standing just inside a nexial portal that leads into the
Astral Plane.  It seems that you have found the lair of the Githyanki,
the once-human followers of Lady Gith.  Ahead of you stands a steel door
leading into the keep hewn from stone.

exdescs.steel: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

851.name: A guard station
851.description:
This is a small building just inside the keep.  Doors lead out to the east
and west.  Some small weapons hang on hooks on the walls, for use in defense
of the keep.  Doors stand in all directions save north.

exdescs.door: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
exdescs.steel: The door is made from a set of rusting steel plates set deep into the stone.

852.name: A grey road
852.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red
sun hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear
none of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road turns to the north, while to the east is a strong iron door.

exdescs.door: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.

853.name: A grey road
853.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road continues to the north and south, while doors to the east
and west allow you to enter two stone buildings.

exdescs.door: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

854.name: A grey road
854.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road extends to the east and south.

855.name: A grey road
855.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone extends to the east and west, while two double doors to the
north allow you to enter an enormous building.

exdescs.doors:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
exdescs.metal:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.

856.name: A grey road
856.description:
The ground beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road ranges to the east and west, while a door to the south
leads into a tall stone building.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

857.name: A grey road
857.description:
The ground beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road lies to the south and west, while a door to the north leads
into a tall stone building.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

858.name: A grey road
858.description:
The ground beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road lies to the north and south, while a door is set in a large
stone building to the east.

exdescs.door: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

859.name: A grey road
859.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road continues to the north and south.

860.name: A grey road
860.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road lies to the north and west, while to the east is a door
which leads into a large stone building.

exdescs.door: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

861.name: A grey road
861.description:
The road beneath your feet is of plain grey cobblestone.  A dull red sun
hangs in the orange sky above your head, strangely still.  You hear none
of the sounds you would commonly associate with a normal city.  The
cobblestone road stretches eastward, while doors to the north and west
allow entrance into two stone buildings.

exdescs.door: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from a set of iron plates set deep into the stone.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

862.name: A small building
862.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks,
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

863.name: A small building
863.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building, which apparently serves as
living quarters for several githyanki gish.  The walls are heavy stone blocks,
covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  A couple of candles
burn dimly in sconces here and there.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

864.name: A large dwelling
864.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

865.name: The Githyanki Weaponry
865.description:
You have entered a large chamber full of weapons in various states of
completion.  Strange glowing blocks of silvery metal are being pounded and
rolled out into deadly razor-sharp knives, daggers and swords.  The sounds
of hammering and fierce waves of heat emerge from the archway to the north.
To the west is an iron door which leads back to the sole road of the githyanki
keep.

exdescs.door: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

866.name: The Forge
866.description:
In the center of the room is a massive furnace which emits great gouts of
heat and a strange smell which comes from the melting of the silvery metal used
by the githyanki.  A large trough of icy water stands to the west, used for
quenching hot metal.  Archways lie to the north and south, while the door to
the furnace lies to the east.

exdescs.door:
The entire furnace is glowing white-hot to the touch.
The furnace door looks too hot to even attempt to open.
exdescs.furnace:
The entire furnace is glowing white-hot to the touch.
The furnace door looks too hot to even attempt to open.

867.name: The Githyanki Armoury
867.description:
You have entered a large chamber filled with suits of armor in various
states of completion.  In this chamber the hard steels of the githyanki are
shaped into ornately fashioned suits of mail.  Sounds of hammering and
waves of heat emerge from the archway to the south, while a door to the
west leads back out to the cobblestone road.

exdescs.door: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is made from many hammered iron plates, set deep into the stone wall.

868.name: Inside the furnace
868.description:
You gasp for breath and choke on toxic sulphur and brimstone.  The sweat
on your forehead is instantly vaporized by the flames that surround you.  You
begin to feel faint and dizzy from the heat...

exdescs.e: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.
exdescs.east: The flames blind you and obscure your vision.

869.name: A guard station
869.description:
You are standing in a small, fairly empty building that serves as the prison
for the keep.  The building is small because the githyanki do not make a habit
of taking prisoners and those that they do capture do not last long.  The
cells lie to the west, while the grey cobblestone road lies beyond a door
to the east.

exdescs.door: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.
exdescs.iron: The door is fashioned from many iron plates and set deep into the stone wall.

870.name: The cellblock
870.description:
A torch firmly held in a sconce on the western wall illuminates this dim
corridor.  Recently used whips, manacles and chains hang on the walls, soaked
with many different types of blood.  Cell doors stand to the north and south,
while the guard station lies to the east.

exdescs.cell:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.
exdescs.door:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

871.name: A cramped cell
871.description:
You are in a tiny, dank cell.  The chill air lashes at your flesh and
you wonder how long the githyanki expect the cell's occupant to
survive.  The only exit is back through the door to the south.

exdescs.cell:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.
exdescs.door:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

872.name: A tiny cell
872.description:
You are in a tiny, dank cell.  The chill air lashes at your flesh and
you wonder how long the githyanki expect the cell's occupant to
survive.  The only exit is back through the door to the north.

exdescs.cell:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.
exdescs.door:
The cell door is wooden and about 4' high, with a slot in the bottom to pass
food underneath to the prisoner.

873.name: A large dwelling
873.description:
You have stepped inside a dimly lit building with vaulted ceilings and high
windows.  The walls are heavy stone blocks that rise tens of feet above your
head, covered with panels of strangely knotted and twisted wood.  On the floor
are charcoal stencils of pentagrams and various other ominous sigils.

exdescs.door: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.
exdescs.wooden: The door is thick, made from a knotted and twisted greyish wood.

874.name: South End of the Hall
874.description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.  The great hall continues to the north and ends in a pair
of huge metal doors to the south.

exdescs.armor: The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.
exdescs.doors:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
exdescs.metal:
The doors are formed from a silvery substance that feels very hard yet almost
slippery to the touch.  They are covered in images in bas-relief, depicting
scenes of combat between humans and strange tentacle-mouthed humanoids.
exdescs.suits: The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.
exdescs.weapons: Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.

875.name: North End of the Hall
875.description:
This is a massive stone hall, lit by flaming blue stones set into the walls.
Massive suits of armor line the walls, holding weapons fashioned from a strange
silvery metal.  The great hall continues to the south, while thick mists
to the north prevent further passage.

exdescs.arch: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
exdescs.archway: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
exdescs.armor: The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.
exdescs.door: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
exdescs.suits: The suits of armor are very intricately and ornately fashioned splint mail.
exdescs.weapons: Massive pole arms, spears, mighty swords, all kinds of death-dealing devices.

876.name: The Altar Chamber
876.description:
Your eyes have trouble adjusting to the dim lighting.  All around you are
statues of githyanki turned towards the altar which stands at the top of a
short flight of steps to the north.

exdescs.arch: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
exdescs.archway: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.
exdescs.door: The archway is shrouded in a strange black mist that obscures your vision.

877.name: Before the Altar
877.description:
You have climbed the mighty steps of the altar chamber and stand before a
huge altar used to pay tribute to Lady Gith, the long-dead ruler of the
githyanki.  The altar is covered in blood and radiates an unspeakable
power that is absorbed by the horrible presence which stands before you.

exdescs.altar: The altar is a huge sacrificial altar covered in bloodstains.
exdescs.blood: The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.
exdescs.bloodstains: The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.
exdescs.hole: The holes have passed countless amounts of blood down below the altar.
exdescs.holes: The holes have passed countless amounts of blood down below the altar.
exdescs.stains: The stains of blood run down off the altar towards your feet, oozing quietly.

878.name: A Gateway to the Underworld
878.description:
You step through the tiny hole in the altar, and stand before a swirling
field of blackness.  Through the field you can hear the howls of lost souls
and long-dead beings.

exdescs.blood: The blood drips from above your head and falls through the field...
exdescs.field:
The field pulses and feeds on the blood dripping from above.

A tangible wave of hatred washes over you, striking fear into your very soul.
exdescs.gateway:
The field pulses and feeds on the blood dripping from above.

A tangible wave of hatred washes over you, striking fear into your very soul.

879.name: Utter Darkness and Despair
879.description:
A heavy darkness weighs upon this vast territory, reducing your vision to
mere feet.  Flittering shapes seem to emerge from the blackness then return
to the shadows in fear of your light.  Though there is no apparent danger,
waves of fear pass through your body and you remain on your guard...
